com.jinengo.reporting.controller.api.user
Class UserApiController

java.lang.Object
  com.jinengo.reporting.controller.api.user.UserApiController

@Controller
@RequestMapping(value="/api/user")
public class UserApiController
extends java.lang.Object

Jinengo REST-API to deliver BI-Data to Client Applications via JSON-Response Every URL Request {BaseUrl}/api/user is mapped to this controller

Author:
lars schuettemeyer
